data.title: Charles E. Peck, Sr. Obituary 2023
data.meta_description: Charles E. Peck, Sr. "Charlie", 72, of Taylor St., North Providence, passed away on Sunday, August 6, 2023 at Roger Williams Medical Center in Providence.  He was the beloved hu...
data.text:
Charles E. Peck, Sr. “Charlie”, 72, of Taylor St., North Providence, passed away on Sunday, August 6, 2023 at Roger Williams Medical Center in Providence. He was the beloved husband for 23 years of Robin A. (Russo) Peck. Born in South Kingstown, he was the son of the late William J. and Florence F. (Charette) Peck.

Charlie worked for the City of Warwick Highway Department for 30 years before retiring.

Besides his wife Robin, Charlie was the devoted father of Tina E. Goldsboro of Warwick and Charles E. Peck, Jr., and his wife Susan of Braintree, MA; cherished grandfather of Nicole Goldsboro, Glendon Goldsboro, Jr., Brianna Mejia and Jonathan Peck; loving great-grandfather of six; and dear brother of Luette McGowan of North Carolina, Elaine McLaughlin of Florida, Florence Leonard of Warwick, Mary Chamberlain of Pawtucket, George Peck of Las Vegas and the late Marge Leamy, Cheri Peck, Billy Peck, Jimmy Peck, Richard Peck and Mike Peck.

VISITING HOURS are SATURDAY MORNING, August 12th from 9:30 a.m. to 11 a.m. at the NARDOLILLO FUNERAL HOME & Crematory, 1278 Park Ave., Cranston, with a Funeral Service at 11 a.m. to which relatives and friends are invited.

Inurnment will take place at a later date.

In lieu of flowers, memorial contributions may be made to: St. Jude Children’s Hospital, 501 St. Jude Place, Memphis, TN 38105-9959.
